name: HadleyHelps
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hadley helps
des:
Detailed description:
With Hadley you’ll discover new ways to do things; things that may have become more difficult with vision loss. For instance, pouring coffee without burning yourself, or using your smartphone to read through your mail. You can also find connection to others through Hadley; it can be so reassuring to know that you’re not alone in this. What’s more, you never need to come to us. Hadley’s help comes right to you; online, on the phone, or through the mail. And the icing on the cake? Everything at Hadley is free. 

The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
